answers.answer: Why is he so set on inducing if you don't mind me asking?

Cause I have gestational diabetes, high blood pressure, and i am starting to get signs of pre eclampsia. Which are all not good for the baby even thou they say he is great and active. Its just me they are worried about. He is making me fall apart.
He's full term why not ? What if it gets worse throughout these last 3wks? Just saying tho
We already plan on inducing at 39 weeks. Thats next Friday i tell them why not today. But they are want him as close to 40 weeks as possible. Which I think I am close enough.
Hopefully you'll get some answers after you do the pee test this time. Preeclampsia is harmful to you and baby if you have it.
I just did this test on Friday and the doctor said there was protein but not a lot.

question: I am taking the 24 hour urine test for the third time. They keep saying the protein in my urine is not enough to do anything but my doctor is trying everything to find a reason to induce besides my high blood pressure that I have.
title: third times the charm?????
